{"id":1019760982,"question_id":2902,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10Â months","timestamp":1691895431,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1019760982/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Pair Sum in an Array","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maxSum(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        int max= 0;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            for(int j=i+1; j<len; j++ ){\n                \n              \n                if(md(nums[i])==md(nums[j])){\n                    max = Math.max(max, nums[i]+nums[j]);\n                }\n                \n            }\n        }\n        \n        return max/10==0? -1 : max;\n    }\n    \n    \n    private int md (int a){\n        \n        int max = 0;\n        while(a>0){\n            max = Math.max(max, a%10);\n            a/=10;\n        }\n        \n        return max;\n        \n        \n    }\n    \n    private boolean eq(int a){\n        \n       int d = a%10;\n        \n        while(a>0){\n            \n            if(a%10==d){\n                a/=10;\n                continue;\n            }else\n                return false;\n            \n        }\n       \n        \n        return true;\n        \n        \n    }\n    \n    \n    \n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-pair-sum-in-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
